Items.MinutesNote: Editor's Note re Attendance and Voting for the Stated Council Meeting of December 9, 2009 and the Recessed Council Meeting of December 14, 2009:  The Stated Council Meeting of December 9, 2009 was opened and subsequently recessed on December 9, 2009 before being re-opened and adjourned on December 14, 2009.  This Recessed Meeting held on December 14, 2009, therefore, is the continuation of this Stated Council Meeting of December 9, 2009.  Though not present on December 9, 2009, Council Members Liu, Sanders, Seabrook and Rodriguez were present at this Recessed Meeting of December 9, 2009 held on December 14, 2009, and are thereby, considered present for attendance and voting purposes for the Stated Council Meeting of December 9, 2009.  Council Members Liu, Sanders, Seabrook, and Rodriguez chose to cast affirmative votes on December 14, 2009 for the items coupled on the Land Use Call-ups and the General Order Calendar of the Stated Council Meeting of December 9, 2009.   In addition, Council Members Crowley, Stewart, and Weprin were present at the Stated Council Meeting held on December 9, 2009 but were absent on December 14, 2009 and are theerby considered Present but Not Voting for the items on the Supplemental General Order Calendar of the Recessed Council Meeting held on December 14, 2009.

MICHAEL McSWEENEY, City Clerk
